Address.getAllActiveCityTown (  ) 

Gets all active city town addresses. Returns ADODB record object or boolean. The returned adodb object contains rows of array with index keys corresponding to $fld_citytown. public

Returns:
mixed

ADODB-db-link

Address.getLimitActiveCityTown ( $  len = 30,
$  so = 0,
$  oitem = 'name',
$  odir = 'ASC' 
)

Same as getAllActiveCityTown but uses the limit feature of adodb to limit the number or rows actually returned. Returns ADODB record object or boolean.

Parameters:
int Length of data, or number of rows to be returned, default 30 rows
int Start index offset, default 0 = start index
string Sort item, default = 'name'
string Sort direction, default = 'ASC'
Returns:
mixed

Address.getCityTownInfo ( $  nr = ''  )
